attributes.action: Allow children a one week holiday during school time
attributes.additional_details: Allow parents and families to take children on holidays in term time, of 7 days without being fined
attributes.background: A fine of £80 is given to parents taking there children on holiday during term time then £160 if not paid within 21 days, I want the government to remove this fine and allow parents to enjoy family time taking there children on holidays for 7 days during term time

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Allow parents to take their children out of school for 5 school days in a year
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728790
